item.title: Recycle Your Cell Phone To Save A Gorilla
item.description:
Recycling old cell phones is beneficial for many reasons, with one significant reason being the protection of the Eastern Lowland Mountain Gorilla in the Democratic Republic of Congo. You might wonder how cell phone usage impacts gorillas in Africa. The answer lies in the interconnected nature of our ecosystem. Cell phones contain various electronic components, including tantalum capacitors. Tantalum, a scarce and valuable metal, enables the miniaturization of capacitors, making them suitable for slim cell phones...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/recycle-your-cell-phone-to-save-a-gorilla/
